languages.text: {n}Холодная маска Джай отваливается от лица, и под ней вы видите страдальческую гримасу и слезы, текущие по смуглым щекам.{/n} "И долго мы сможем играть в игру "Простушка и Вольный Торговец"? У тебя полный протекторат таких же девиц, как я. Раньше мне удавалось выделяться среди них, а теперь с каждым днем я буду для тебя все более... обычной. Тривиальной. Я как факир, у которого из рукавов просыпались все его забавные игрушки для трюков — мне стоит покинуть сцену, пока не полетели камни и тухлятина. Я... я не хочу, чтобы ты разбивал{mf||а} мне сердце".

{n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

languages.text: {n}婕伊脸上冷漠的面具滑了下来，露出了痛苦不堪的表情，泪水顺着她灰褐色的脸颊滚落下来。{/n}“咱们这场‘行商浪人与傻瓜’的游戏，还能再玩多久呢？你的王朝里有无数像我这样的女人。以前，我还能想办法，让自己从人群之中脱颖而出，可现在，每过一天，我在你眼里只会变得越来越平凡，越来越微不足道。我就像个糟糕的魔术师一样，所有道具都从袖子里掉出来了。我必须趁观众开始扔石头和臭鸡蛋之前赶紧下台。我……我不想让你伤透我的心。”
languages.original_text: {n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊脸上冷漠的面具滑了下来，露出了痛苦不堪的表情，泪水顺着她灰褐色的脸颊滚落下来。{/n}“咱们这场‘行商浪人与傻瓜’的游戏，还能再玩多久呢？你的王朝里有无数像我这样的女人。以前，我还能想办法，让自己从人群之中脱颖而出，可现在，每过一天，我在你眼里只会变得越来越平凡，越来越微不足道。我就像个糟糕的魔术师一样，所有道具都从袖子里掉出来了。我必须趁观众开始扔石头和臭鸡蛋之前赶紧下台。我……我不想让你伤透我的心。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの顔から冷たい仮面が剥がれ落ち、その下にあるものがあらわになる。 苦しそうな表情を浮かべ、涙が褐色の頬を伝う。{/n}「そして、あたし達はいつまで『単細胞と自由開拓者』を演じ続けることができるっていうの？あんたの保護領には、あたしと同じような女性が大勢いる。以前は、群衆の中から自分を際立たせてみせることだってできた。でも今じゃあ、日を追うごとに、どんどん平凡な子になっていってしまってるもっとつまらない何かに。あたしは、小道具を袖から落としてしまった演者みたいなもの…観客が石や腐った食べ物を投げ始める前に舞台から降りなければならないんだ。あたしは…あたしはあんたに振られたくないんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの顔から冷たい仮面が剥がれ落ち、その下にあるものがあらわになる。 苦しそうな表情を浮かべ、涙が褐色の頬を伝う。{/n}「そして、あたし達はいつまで『単細胞と自由開拓者』を演じ続けることができるっていうの？あんたの保護領には、あたしと同じような女性が大勢いる。以前は、群衆の中から自分を際立たせてみせることだってできた。でも今じゃあ、日を追うごとに、どんどん平凡な子になっていってしまってるもっとつまらない何かに。あたしは、小道具を袖から落としてしまった演者みたいなもの…観客が石や腐った食べ物を投げ始める前に舞台から降りなければならないんだ。あたしは…あたしはあんたに振られたくないんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}La máscara de frialdad se desprende del rostro de Jae, revelando lo que hay debajo: una expresión torturada y unas mejillas tostadas surcadas de lágrimas.{/n} «¿Y durante cuánto tiempo seguiremos jugando a "{mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y la plebeya"? Tú tienes un protectorado lleno de mujeres como yo. Antes podía sobresalir de entre todas las demás, pero cada día que pasa, a tus ojos, seré cada vez más vulgar. Más insignificante. Soy como una malabarista que no da pie con bola; tengo que abandonar el escenario antes de que me lluevan las pedradas y la fruta podrida. Yo... no quiero que me rompas el corazón».
languages.original_text: {n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La máscara de frialdad se desprende del rostro de Jae, revelando lo que hay debajo: una expresión torturada y unas mejillas tostadas surcadas de lágrimas.{/n} «¿Y durante cuánto tiempo seguiremos jugando a "{mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente y la plebeya"? Tú tienes un protectorado lleno de mujeres como yo. Antes podía sobresalir de entre todas las demás, pero cada día que pasa, a tus ojos, seré cada vez más vulgar. Más insignificante. Soy como una malabarista que no da pie con bola; tengo que abandonar el escenario antes de que me lluevan las pedradas y la fruta podrida. Yo... no quiero que me rompas el corazón».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Son masque de froideur tombe, laissant paraître ses véritables sentiments : son visage exprime désormais la douleur, tandis que des larmes coulent le long de ses joues hâlées.{/n} « Et combien de temps encore allons-nous pouvoir jouer à la nigaude et {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ? Votre protectorat est rempli de femmes comme moi. Pendant longtemps, j'ai pu me démarquer du reste de la foule, mais plus les jours passent et plus je perds de mon piquant à vos yeux. Je deviens banale. Je suis comme une prestidigitatrice qui perd une à une les cartes cachées dans ses manches ; je dois quitter la scène avant que le public ne se mette à me jeter des cailloux et des tomates. Je... Je refuse de vous laisser me briser le cœur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

Votre protectorat est rempli de femmes comme moi. Pendant longtemps, j'ai pu me démarquer du reste de la foule, mais plus les jours passent et plus je perds de mon piquant à vos yeux. Je deviens banale. Je suis comme une prestidigitatrice qui perd une à une les cartes cachées dans ses manches ; je dois quitter la scène avant que le public ne se mette à me jeter des cailloux et des tomates. Je... Je refuse de vous laisser me briser le cœur. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die kalte Maske fällt von Jaes Gesicht ab und deckt auf, was sich darunter verbirgt: ein gequälter Gesichtsausdruck und Tränen, die an ihren gebräunten Wangen herunterrollen.{/n} "Und wie lange können wir noch 'Die Idiotin und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}' spielen? In Eurem ganzen Protektorat wimmelt es nur so von Frauen wie mir. Früher konnte ich mich noch von der ganzen Masse abheben, aber mittlerweile werde ich in Euren Augen doch mit jedem Tag nur gewöhnlicher. Trivialer. Ich bin wie eine Künstlerin, der die Requisiten für ihre Tricks aus den Ärmeln fallen – ich sollte die Bühne verlassen, bevor das Publikum mit Steinen und verdorbenem Essen wirft. Ich ... Ich will nicht, dass Ihr mir das Herz brecht."
languages.original_text: {n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

Früher konnte ich mich noch von der ganzen Masse abheben, aber mittlerweile werde ich in Euren Augen doch mit jedem Tag nur gewöhnlicher. Trivialer. Ich bin wie eine Künstlerin, der die Requisiten für ihre Tricks aus den Ärmeln fallen – ich sollte die Bühne verlassen, bevor das Publikum mit Steinen und verdorbenem Essen wirft. Ich ... Ich will nicht, dass Ihr mir das Herz brecht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın yüzündeki soğuk maskenin düşmesiyle altında yatan şey açığa çıkıyor: Kederli bir yüz ifadesi ve sarımsı kahverengi yanaklarından süzülen gözyaşları.{/n} "Peki 'Basit Kız ve Hür Tacir' oyununu oynamayı ne kadar sürdürebiliriz? Benim gibi kadınlarla dolu koca bir protektoran var. Kalabalığın içinden bir şekilde sivrilmeyi başardım ama her geçen gün, gözlerinde giderek daha da sıradanlaşacağım. Önemsizleşeceğim. Numaraları için gereken şeyleri giysisinin kolundan yuvarlanıp düşen bir sihirbaz gibiyim. İzleyiciler taş ve çürük yiyecek fırlatmaya başlamadan önce sahneden inmem gerek. Ben... Kalbimin senin tarafından kırılmasını istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The cold mask falls from Jae's face, revealing what lies beneath: a tortured expression and tears rolling down her tawny cheeks.{/n} "And how long will we be able to keep playing 'The Simpleton and the Rogue Trader'? You have a protectorate full of women just like me. Before, I was able to make myself stand out from the crowd, but now with every passing day, in your eyes, I'll just become more ordinary. More trivial. I'm like a performer whose props for his tricks have come tumbling out of his sleeves — I need to get off the stage before the crowd start throwing stones and rotten food. I... I don't want to have my heart broken by you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın yüzündeki soğuk maske düşüyor, altında yatan şey açığa çıkıyor: Kederli bir yüz ifadesi ve sarımsı kahverengi yanaklarından süzülen gözyaşları.{/n} "Peki 'Basit Kız ve Hür Tacir' oyununu oynamayı ne kadar sürdürebiliriz? Benim gibi kadınlarla dolu koca bir protektoran var. Kalabalığın içinden bir şekilde sivrilmeyi başardım ama her geçen günle beraber senin gözlerinde giderek daha da sıradanlaşacağım. Daha önemsizleşeceğim. Numalaraları için gereken şeyleri giysisinin kolundan yuvarlanıp düşen bir sihirbaz gibiyim. İzleyiciler taş ve çürük yiyecek fırlatmaya başlamadan önce sahneden inmem gerek. Ben... Kalbimin senin tarafından kırılmasını istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
